name: An Secret Game
description:
This game is my submission to the GameDevMotivation Jam#3

When launching the game you face up a black screen.

its up to you to discover how to pass that black screen and access the game.

If you want to play the game without attempting to solve the puzzle...(and have better design)

click here

If you find how to access to the game let me know in the comments section :D
